definition: no use to tell others/let's keep this between ourselves (idiom)
pinyin: bu4 zu2 wei2 wai4 ren2 dao4

definition: variant of 為|为[wei4], because of/for/to
variant of 為|为[wei2]/as (i.e. in the capacity of)/to take sth as/to act as/to serve as/to behave as/to become/to be/to do
as (in the capacity of)/to take sth as/to act as/to serve as/to behave as/to become/to be/to do/by (in the passive voice)

road/path/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3]/principle/truth/morality/reason/skill/method/Dao (of Daoism)/to say/to speak/to talk/classifier for long thin things (rivers, cracks etc), barriers (walls, doors etc), questions (in an exam etc), commands, courses in a meal, steps in a process/(old) circuit (administrative division)
a secret/sth best not told to anyone/confidential information
the person who drinks it knows best whether the water is hot or cold (Zen proverb); self-awareness comes from within/to know best by personal experience
pinyin: ru2 ren2 yin3 shui3 , leng3 nuan3 zi4 zhi1

definition: to withhold information/to keep sth secret
sth one wishes to keep secret/ulterior motive/a subject best avoided
to be too embarrassed to mention sth (idiom)/to find it hard to speak about sth
a hidden trouble hard to mention (idiom)/sth too embarrassing to mention/an embarrassing illness
behind-the-scenes story/details known only to insiders
